short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Gives the option to save WEBP images to JPG/PNG

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A new "Save Image As..." with the icon of the extension will appear when you right-click an image. You need to use this, because it's not possible to modify the behavior of chrome's native "Save image as..." context menu option.

.webp images can be a nuisance to deal with, here you're given an option to save the image as either a JPG or PNG instead. Conversion is done for you, directly.
